channel.title: [604] Ranging Damage
channel.description: How can I modify the damage that ranging does? Like I'm trying to edit Dragon Bolts (e) right now, when I change stats it doesn't change the damage, so the bolts are hitting a max of 230...And thats with the dragon bolt effect, so how do I edit both the effect and increase damage over all with it?

item.title: [604] Ranging Damage
item.dc:creator: @99rangek0 99rangek0
item.description:
@99rangek0 wrote:

How can I modify the damage that ranging does? Like I’m trying to edit Dragon Bolts (e) right now, when I change stats it doesn’t change the damage, so the bolts are hitting a max of 230…And thats with the dragon bolt effect, so how do I edit both the effect and increase damage over all with it?
